title: 06/04/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lakers, LeBron, Blazers, Clippers

description:
The Lakers were inconsistent all season

Damian Lillard should consider leaving the Blazers

LeBron's legacy is fine

Why aren't people blaming Kawhi Leonard?


Guest: Kevin O'Connor
